page.title: 11Population
page.content: There are two good examples of Medieval Dovecots in the village indicating two large estates in the past. The last estate was sold off in 1984.There are three farms the largest been of five hundred acres. Mechanisation has reduced the number of farm workes.Only our familys can boast three generation still work on the land.Many residents are relatively new to the village.Those people entering the village are active or retired professionals.This has further eroded the agriculturd population as the newcomers buy up old property and when renovated fetch high prices on the property market.There is evidence of a larger village once existed as can be found with the foundation of houses in ploughed fields.A number of buildings are over five hundred years old.
